screenplay.rawText:
INT. JASON’S ART STUDIO – MORNING
Jason continues painting the commission. A time-lapse sequence shows the progression of the artwork over several days: Day 6, Day 7, Day 8, Day 9, Day 10, Day 11, and Day 12—each indicated by title cards.
actions: Jason works on increasingly detailed sections of the painting.
Camera captures a time-lapse of Jason moving around the canvas.
Lighting shifts subtly to show different days and sessions.
Title cards display: DAY 6, DAY 7, DAY 8, DAY 9, DAY 10, DAY 11, DAY 12.
Jason’s clothing changes subtly across the days.
The painting becomes significantly more developed.

narrative.summary: A montage spanning Days 6 through 12 shows Jason steadily progressing on the line-work and illustration details. The time-lapse emphasizes the long, meticulous nature of this stage in the process.
narrative.beatPurpose: Show the passage of time and progress toward the deadline; convey the labor-intensive nature of the commission; transition efficiently through mid-process days.
narrative.conflict: Mostly internal — endurance, focus, and staying consistent across many slow work sessions.
narrative.stakes: Jason must maintain pace to finish before the two-week deadline; the pressure increases as the days advance.
narrative.outcome: Significant progress is made; the painting nears late-stage development.

emotionalShifts.Jason Towne: Focused → tired → determined → increasingly absorbed in the work

continuityLinks: Represents the bulk of the mid-stage illustration work Jason predicted earlier in SC-007.
Leads toward the final days of the two-week deadline.

VFX: Extended time-lapse sequence spanning multiple days
Title card overlays: DAY 6, DAY 7, DAY 8, DAY 9, DAY 10, DAY 11, DAY 12
music: Montage cue with steady rhythm or evolving progression to match creative build-up
cameraIdeas: Cut-ins of macro details developing over days
Cross dissolves between each day title card
